content.rendered:
Many forms are in PDF format.

Student Handbooks & Guides
  • Academic Probation: Understanding AP & How to Reboot
  • Leave of Absence (LOA) & Withdrawal Handbook (Traditional Undergraduates)
    • Form Only (ROC/CAPA)
  • Selecting a Major (LVGE 2015-Later)
  • Selecting a Major (GE Track I)
  • Academic Expectations: Study Plan & Study Cycle
  • Course-level Academic Success Guide (Remote Learning)
  • Student Guide to Using Artificial Intelligence in the Classroom. (Free under Creative Commons license).
Articulation, Registration and Testing Documents
  • AP Exam Chart
  • CLEP Exam Chart
  • IB Exam Chart
  • My LaVerne Student Services (for students)
  • Academic Advising Hold (PDF): Advisor removal of the (AAH) in Banner 9 Student Profile: Video
Advising Forms (Most Commonly used); Registrar Forms, HERE.
  • Academic Advisor Change Request *
  • Catalog Year Change Request *
  • Major, Minor, or Concentration Change * (Traditional Undergraduates Only)
  • Advisor/Major Change Form (ROC/CAPA)
  • Grade Option Change Form*
  • Major-Course-Substitution or Waiver
  • Third Party Authorization (Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act, also known as FERPA)
  • Withdrawal and Leave of Absence, see Student Handbooks & Guides above.
Academic Reinstatement Appeal after Disqualification
  • Academic Reinstatement Appeal Form (Fillable, download first).
    • Fill out the appeal form and submit it with supportive documentation, HERE.
    • Then, make an appointment with Dr. Carlos Cervantes, HERE.
Advising Worksheets
  • Class Schedule Worksheet (Track I/II)
  • Four Year Plan Worksheet (Track I/II) (Interactive) (NOTE: “Save File,” then Open)
  • Math Advising Tips (All)
  • Path to Graduation and Four Year Plan (Track I)
General Education (GE) Certification Forms and Information
La Verne Experience GE – Fall 2015 – Current
  • GE Requirements (Fall 2020-LATER)
  • LVGE Path to Graduation (Fall 2020-LATER)
  • GE Requirements (Pre-Fall 2020)
  • LVGE Four Year Plan Worksheet (Interactive) (Note: “Save File,” then Open)
  • Honors Program Curriculum and General Education Mapping
    • View Honors Certificate on MyDegree Tracker (PDF).
    • Video overview of the Honors Program.
GE Track I Worksheets
  • Track I GE Checklist
  • Track I GE Codes
Honors
  • Honors Program Curriculum and General Education Mapping
    • View Honors Certificate on MyDegree Tracker (PDF).
    • Video overview of the Honors Program.
    • Advising Honors Students
Placement Testing
  • ASC “A Guide for Advisors” (and students): Directed Self-Placement, Placement Test Recommendations
  • Placement Scores: Foreign Language, Mathematics Placement
GE Track II Worksheets
  • Track II GE Checklist
  • Track II GE Codes

* Organizational login required.
